mapper.insert: insert into oa_sys.workreportteacher(uid, releaseUid, nextUid) values (#{uid}, #{releaseUid}, #{nextUid})
mapper.select: select uid, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.workreportteacher where releaseUid = #{releaseUid} and status = 0 order by create_time desc limit 1
select uid, releaseUid, status, count, nextUid, reject_reason, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.workreportteacher where releaseUid = #{releaseUid} and status >= 0 order by create_time desc
select uid, releaseUid, status, count, nextUid, reject_reason, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.workreportteacher where uid = #{uid}
select uid, releaseUid, status, count, nextUid, reject_reason, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.workreportteacher where nextUid = #{nextUid} and status = 0 order by create_time desc
